conductor.raw: Artistic Director & Principal Conductor: Gui Naishun
conductor.bio: Gui Naishun is dedicated to choral art, focusing on vocal blend and cultural inheritance, leading Konzert Singers to pursue beauty and harmony across diverse repertoire.
conductor.education: Background in music and choral conducting
conductor.experience: Years of choral conducting and teaching
achievements: Improved members' expression and stage performance
conductor.philosophy: Music is a bridge of the soul; choir connects us in harmony.

conductors.name: Gui Naishun
conductors.title: Artistic Director & Principal Conductor
conductors.bio: Dedicated to choral promotion and practice, focusing on vocal blend and cultural inheritance.
conductors.education: Background in music and choral conducting
conductors.experience: Years of choral conducting and teaching
highlights: Advanced choral conducting at the Royal Academy of Music; Fellow of the London College of Music
Led choirs to win top international championships; over 100 international gold awards
Multiple Best Conductor awards in Germany, Italy, Austria and Czech Republic
Artistic Director of ‘Song Journey’ and ‘Asia Singing’; Founder and Artistic Director of Singapore Choral Festival
Choral advisor and music appraisal officer at National Arts Council; member of People’s Association arts advisory
Cultivated local talent; ~40% of Singapore choral conductors trained by him
conductors.philosophy: Music is a bridge of the soul; choir connects us in harmony.

conductors.name: Feng Kelen
conductors.title: Artistic Director & Conductor
conductors.bio: Focuses on choral training and stage presentation, emphasizing subtle expression and overall harmony.
conductors.education: Master in Choral Conducting (Honors) at Saint Joseph University; Conducting Fellowship Diploma at London College of Music
conductors.experience: Consistent top awards at Singapore Youth Festival; multiple international golds and grand prix; three-time Best Conductor
highlights: Master in Choral Conducting (Honors), Saint Joseph University; Conducting Fellowship, London College of Music
Only Singapore conductor achieving SYF Honours Gold across primary, secondary and junior college
Since 2013, choirs under his baton winning top awards at SYF
International golds and grand prix in Italy, Czech Republic, Russia, China
Three-time Best Conductor at international competitions
Frequently invited juror and conducting mentor internationally
Started at semi-professional choir ‘Vocal Associates’, mentored by Gui Naishun
Guided by masters including Pedro Monteiro and Maestro Gábor Hollerung
Conducted Singapore Chinese Orchestra ‘Harmony Voices’ with 200-voice choir
Choral director for Kit Chan’s ‘My Musical Journey’ concert
Assistant Conductor at MTDC program, nurturing young singers in secondary schools
Artistic Director of the inaugural Singapore Choral Festival 2015 (SG50), 1000+ singers
Currently conducts SAJC, Commonwealth Sec, and Nan Hua Sec top choirs
conductors.philosophy: Share beauty through music; connect hearts in harmony.

intro:
This is a group of passionate music lovers who believe that sound is not merely a pleasure to the ears, but a resonance of the soul. The body is the most natural instrument, and the blending of different vocal parts can transform into captivating harmonies.
This is a group of cultural enthusiasts who embrace diversity. Deeply rooted in their love for Chinese culture, they also welcome the brilliance of cultures around the world, firmly believing that music is the most powerful bridge between cultures and the most enduring path of cultural heritage.
This is a group of people who love life. For them, music is the language through which they express life, infusing each day with beautiful melodies.
Among them are the young, the middle-aged, and the elderly. Youthful and vibrant, composed and steady, serene and peaceful.
It is music that has brought them together, gathering in harmony!
Through music, they express their hearts, and convey truth, beauty, and goodness!
They sing, and their songs live on.
Konzert Singers!

videos.title: Embracing the Sunset
videos.description: Konzert Singers perform a classic Chinese piece

performances.name: SG60 Choral Festival
performances.intro: A grand choral celebration for Singapore’s 60th anniversary, gathering outstanding choirs to perform together.

performances.name: SOTA Musicians Association 15th Anniversary Celebration
performances.intro: A commemorative concert at SOTA, honoring fifteen years of artistry and education.
